modName: Zat Gun Mod and Sound Effects original - Stargate SG-1
summary: Add the Zat'nik'tel, a Goa'uld weapon. Also with the original sound effects.
descriptionHtml:
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

DESCRIPTION:
Hello everyone! With this mod you can add the Zat'nik'tel, the Goa'uld weapon of Stargate! This also add the original sounds when you equip the weapon and when shoot.
This weapon can be forge in a smith, in the |Misc| section.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

INSTALLATION AND UNISTALLATION:
Download ad install the package with NMM OR put the file manually in their respective folders.
To remove, just unistall this mod with the manager OR delete manually the file.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

CHANGELOG:
v 1.0.1
- Fixed bug of textures (I'm really sorry)
v 1.0.0
- Initial release
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

KNOW BUG:
- When you fire, the shot is not part of the "barrel" of the weapon, but part from another location higher. This is because all the staff have this feature.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

SUPPLEMENTARY MOD:
- Jaffa Staff Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40648//?
- Predators The Lost Tribes: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24543/?
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

ENDNOTES:
- Sorry for my English. This is my second language.
- A special thanks to roland113. He help me with a problem of texture

IF YOU LIKE THIS MOD, PLEASE ENDORSE AND VOTE!
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
author: alexmafia18
